name: Alprazolam/Xanax
description: Alprazolam is mostly used in short term management of anxiety disorders, panic disorders, and nausea due to chemotherapy
effectsDesc: Like other benzodiazepines, alprazolam binds to specific sites on the GABAA receptor. It is commonly used for the medical treatment of panic disorder, generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), or social anxiety disorder (SAD).
effects: anxiety suppression, sedation, disinhibition, and muscle relaxation
negativeEffects: aggression, increased anxiety, violent behavior, loss of impulse control, irritability and suicidal behavior
Alprazolam is extremely physically and psychologically addictive
safetyTips: if panic:Try to reassure the person and tell them you want to help.
